nodes.text: A female individual was the mother of Ruen, a human male who was a skilled technician. Doctor Chelli Lona Aphra came to know Ruen, claiming that the technician would be willing to sell his mother into slavery to fund a project. The assassin droid 0-0-0 recorded Aphra's statement, playing it for Ruen when he and the "blastomech" prototype BT-1 journeyed to Ruen's workshop for repairs on the Wreck Belt of the planet Lotho Minor at some point between 0 ABY and 1 ABY. Hearing Aphra's statement, Ruen determined that the two droids belonged to her.
The mother of Ruen was mentioned in "The Misadventures of Triple-Zero and Beetee," a comic story written by Kieron Gillen that was published by Marvel Comics in Darth Vader 20 on May 11, 2016.
